message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000.  I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective on the price.  However, the true value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $925,000. This is my final offer.
